item.title: Report E-2025020104
item.description:
Report E-2025020104

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-07
  • City: JACKSON
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 7, 2025, one (1) 5,000 pound supersack of Eka SC was damaged during loading and released approximately one (1) pound of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the sire. The crew collected the spent product into one (1) 5-gallon pail and all debris/PPE was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The crew transferred the contents of the supersack into one (1) new sack.
